name: In Limbo
description:
You don't know where you are.  You don't know how you ended up here. This place doesn't make any sense but it seems familiar somehow.  You have a burning feeling that you shouldn't stay...

Control:
  • WASD to move
  • Shift to sprint
  • E to interact with object
  • Left Mouse to fire or charge your swing
  • Right Mouse to aim down sight
  • Q to switch weapon
  • Space to pump/cock your weapon (only in hard mode)
  • Escape to open options
Attributions :
